title: Art Exhibition Opening
description: Join us for the opening of a new art exhibition featuring local artists. There will be a meet-and-greet with the artists, refreshments, and live music.

title: Charity Fun Run
description: Support a good cause by joining our annual charity fun run! Participants can choose to run 5km or 10km. All proceeds will go to local charities.

title: Film Festival
description: Enjoy a selection of independent films from around the world at our annual film festival. Discussions and Q&A sessions with the filmmakers will follow each screening.

title: Book Club Meeting
description: Our monthly book club meeting. This month, we're discussing 'The Great Gatsby' by F. Scott Fitzgerald. Refreshments will be provided.

title: Local Farmers' Market
description: Support local farmers and enjoy fresh produce at our weekly farmers' market. You'll find a variety of fruits, vegetables, baked goods, and more.
